hero.title: Sandro Dezerio
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer | Transforming Ideas into Functional, Impactful Software
hero.description: Experienced in building end-to-end systems and guiding teams through technical challenges. I'm committed to continuous learning, clear communication, and empowering others.

description.p1: Hi, I'm Sandro Dezerio, a passionate software engineer with 8 years of experience building complete digital solutions. My journey in tech has taken me from freelance projects to leading teams in established companies, always driven by a love for problem-solving and innovation.
description.p2: I believe in the power of teamwork, clear communication, and continuous learning. Whether I'm mentoring junior developers or collaborating with cross-functional teams, I strive to create an environment where everyone can grow and succeed.
description.p3: My approach blends technical expertise with a focus on real-world impact. I enjoy transforming ideas into functional, impactful software that helps businesses automate, innovate, and thrive.
description.p4: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, sharing knowledge with the community, or enjoying time outdoors.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications for clients across various industries.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
experience.description: Worked with small businesses to create custom software solutions.

services.title: Services
services.description: I offer a range of services to help businesses digitalize their operations and improve efficiency. Here are some of the services I provide:

servicesList.title: Custom Software Development
servicesList.description: Tailored software solutions to meet your business needs.

servicesList.title: Process Automation
servicesList.description: Automate repetitive tasks to save time and reduce errors.

servicesList.title: E-commerce Solutions
servicesList.description: Build and optimize online stores to boost sales.

servicesList.title: API Integration
servicesList.description: Seamlessly integrate third-party APIs into your systems.

servicesList.title: Cloud Computing
servicesList.description: Migrate and manage your applications in the cloud.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: I'm currently working on some exciting projects. Check back soon to see my work!

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Have a question or want to work together? Feel free to reach out!
